name: GemWords
summary: GemWords is a delightful game that combines gem popping fun with family-friendly anagram solving. Players tap or click the pivots to spin the gems and create groups of four same-color gems to pop them. Popping sparkling gems rewards players with letters, which they collect to solve anagrams and win levels. The game is designed to be enjoyable for all ages, making it a perfect blend of puzzle-solving and casual gaming.
